TopicTitle: Disrepencies and bugs in the tracking station menu descriptions

Articles.Content:
Most of these are simple mistakes hence why Im putting them in one thread. Going to break this down into text related bugs and actual bugs

Text related bugs: 

Moho claims that the planet is tidally locked while it just isn't. 

Jool describes how there is no land to land on, there is in fact land to land on. This should probably be rewritten to be something along the lines of "Any probe sent into Jool has descended into the depths with no method of recovery in sight", this leads it vague if there's a surface or not and pushes players towards exploring it themselves. 

Actual bugs:
Geothermal activity is low for every planet, probably not intended behavior.

Tempature range is the same for every planet and is listed as 123, should probably be listed as something like 20-130 C instead of just a single number.
